TextEng: "Who are you?"
"Durnan called for heroes. I'm here to do the right thing."
Text: "더난이 영웅들을 불렀어. 난 옳은 일을 하러 왔어."

TextEng: "I have my own companions to worry about."
"I'd like that."
"I should go."
"Can I ask you some questions?"
"Where do I find Durnan?"
"Do you know anything about what's going on in Waterdeep?"
"Tell me about these friends of yours."
"Why don't you join me instead?"
"Tell me about yourself."
"What is this reward again?"
"What do you know about Undermountain?"
"I don't think our faiths have much in common."
Text: "우리 신앙은 별로 공통점이 없는 것 같은데."

TextEng: "You think I want to adventure with you? That's assuming a lot."
Text: "내가 너랑 모험하고 싶을 거라고? 너무 많이 가정하는구나."

TextEng: "I work better on my own."
"If there's a chance to kill something, I'll always take it."
Text: "뭐든 죽일 기회가 있으면 난 항상 잡아."

TextEng: "If it ever becomes your business, I'll let you know."
"To be honest, I don't really know why I'm here."
Text: "솔직히 난 왜 여기 있는지 잘 모르겠어."

TextEng: "I care what happens to Waterdeep, even if you don't."
Text: "넌 아닐지도 모르지만, 난 워터딥에 무슨 일이 일어나는지 신경 쓰이거든."

TextEng: "I'm always looking for adventure, if the reward is right."
